T02D2556:22a-1: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba /
T02D2556:22a-2: mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba dang /
T02D2556:22a-3: mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba'o //
T02D2556:22a-4: de la mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba ni mi
T02D2556:22a-5: dmigs pa gsum gyis zin pas 'khor gsum yongs su
T02D2556:22a-7: mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba ni dus gsum
T02D2556:22a-8: gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsngo ba ltar
T02D2556:22b-0: @22b mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba //
